sn55.28:3.1: 28. Paṭhamabhayaverūpasantasutta
sn55.28:4.1: * Sāvatthinidānaṃ.
sn55.28:4.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn55.28:4.3: “yato kho, gahapati, ariyasāvakassa pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni ca honti, catūhi ca sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato hoti, ariyo cassa ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho, so ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṃ byākareyya:
sn55.28:5.1: Katamāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti?
sn55.28:5.2: Yaṃ, gahapati, pāṇātipātī pāṇātipātappaccayā diṭṭhadhammikampi bhayaṃ veraṃ pasavati, samparāyikampi bhayaṃ veraṃ pasavati, cetasikampi dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvediyati.
sn55.28:5.3: Pāṇātipātā paṭiviratassa evaṃ taṃ bhayaṃ veraṃ vūpasantaṃ hoti.
sn55.28:5.7: yaṃ, gahapati, surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhāyī surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānappaccayā diṭṭhadhammikampi bhayaṃ veraṃ pasavati, samparāyikampi bhayaṃ veraṃ pasavati, cetasikampi dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvediyati.
sn55.28:5.8: Surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratassa evaṃ taṃ bhayaṃ veraṃ vūpasantaṃ hoti.
sn55.28:5.9: Imāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti.
sn55.28:6.2: Idha, gahapati, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.28:6.7: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.28:7.1: Katamo cassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho?
sn55.28:7.2: Idha, gahapati, ariyasāvako paṭiccasamuppādaññeva sādhukaṃ yoniso manasi karoti—
sn55.28:7.3: iti imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjati;
sn55.28:7.4: iti imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhati;
sn55.28:7.5: yadidaṃ avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ … pe …
sn55.28:7.9: Ayamassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho.
sn55.28:8.1: Yato kho, gahapati, ariyasāvakassa imāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti, imehi catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato hoti, ayañcassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho.
